Package com.lmax.solana4j.programs

Class SystemProgram

java.lang.Object
com.lmax.solana4j.programs.SystemProgram
public final class SystemProgram extends Object
Program for managing system-level operations on the Solana blockchain.

  • Field Details

    • SYSTEM_PROGRAM_ACCOUNT

      public static final PublicKey SYSTEM_PROGRAM_ACCOUNT
      The public key for the system program account.

      This constant defines the public key associated with the Solana account for the system program. It is set to the value returned by Solana.account(byte[]) using the SYSTEM_PROGRAM_ID.

    • NONCE_ACCOUNT_LENGTH

      public static final int NONCE_ACCOUNT_LENGTH
      The length of a nonce account in bytes.

      This constant defines the fixed length of a nonce account used in Solana.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • MINT_ACCOUNT_LENGTH

      public static final int MINT_ACCOUNT_LENGTH
      The length of a mint account in bytes.

      This constant defines the fixed length of a mint account used in Solana.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • CREATE_ACCOUNT_INSTRUCTION

      public static final int CREATE_ACCOUNT_INSTRUCTION
      The instruction code for creating an account.

      This constant defines the instruction code used to create a new account in Solana.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • TRANSFER_INSTRUCTION

      public static final int TRANSFER_INSTRUCTION
      The instruction code for transferring funds.

      This constant defines the instruction code used to transfer funds between accounts in Solana.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • ADVANCE_NONCE_INSTRUCTION

      public static final int ADVANCE_NONCE_INSTRUCTION
      The instruction code for advancing a nonce.

      This constant defines the instruction code used to advance a nonce in a nonce account in Solana.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • NONCE_INIT_INSTRUCTION

      public static final int NONCE_INIT_INSTRUCTION
      The instruction code for initializing a nonce account.

      This constant defines the instruction code used to initialize a nonce account in Solana.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • factory

      public static SystemProgram factory(TransactionBuilder tb)
      Factory method for creating a new instance of SystemProgram.
      Parameters:
      tb - the transaction builder
      Returns:
      a new instance of SystemProgram

    • createAccount

      public SystemProgram createAccount(PublicKey payer, PublicKey newAccount, long lamports, long space, PublicKey program)
      Creates a new account.
      Parameters:
      payer - the public key of the payer
      newAccount - the public key of the new account
      lamports - the number of lamports to transfer to the new account
      space - the amount of space to allocate for the new account
      program - the public key of the program to associate with the new account
      Returns:
      this SystemProgram instance

    • nonceInitialize

      public SystemProgram nonceInitialize(PublicKey nonce, PublicKey authorized)
      Initializes a nonce account.
      Parameters:
      nonce - the public key of the nonce account
      authorized - the public key of the authorized account
      Returns:
      this SystemProgram instance

    • nonceAdvance

      public SystemProgram nonceAdvance(PublicKey nonce, PublicKey authorized)
      Advances a nonce.
      Parameters:
      nonce - the public key of the nonce account
      authorized - the public key of the authorized account
      Returns:
      this SystemProgram instance

    • transfer

      public SystemProgram transfer(PublicKey from, PublicKey to, long lamports)
      Transfers funds between accounts.
      Parameters:
      from - the public key of the account to transfer funds from
      to - the public key of the account to transfer funds to
      lamports - the amount of lamports to transfer
      Returns:
      this SystemProgram instance

    • getNonceAccountValue

      public static PublicKey getNonceAccountValue(byte[] nonceAccountDataBytes)
      Gets the nonce value from a nonce account's data.
      Parameters:
      nonceAccountDataBytes - the byte array containing the nonce account's data
      Returns:
      the public key representing the nonce value
